flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour so 1 hour 20 minutes = (60+20) minutes = 84 minutes
He will spend a total of 84+10 = <<84+10=94>>94 minutes
94 minutes is = (60/60) hours and 34 minutes = 1 hour 34 minutes = 0130 in 24-hr time
He has to leave 0134 hours earlier than 0900 i.e. 0900-0134 = 0726 hours

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 84. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
